content: this *mini* holiday gift bag uses about 18g when using fingering weight yarn it can be made in any yarn/needle size combination with different resulting finished measurements fingering = finished size about 6inx4 25in i used us 0 and fingering weight but i usually have to go down a couple need sizes to get gauge on most patterns so us2 might be a good starting point for most people i haven t knit a whole lot from patterns yet and this is my first time really writing a pattern so i would say this is not for beginners this was my second project with cables and the first with lace so i am sure there is room for improvement
